Feats-Skill-Athletics -- Male Half-Elf Fighter: 2
Strength: 14 (+2) Dexterity: 14 (+2) Constitution: 10 (+0) Intelligence: 16 (+3) Wisdom: 12 (+1) Charisma: 12 (+1)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 1500/2000 Level: 2 Speed: 25 Size: Medium
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Hefty Hauler: x2 maximum and encumbered Bulk
Features/Skills

Feature Notes:

Fighter Feats: 2 selections
Half-Elf: Has the Low-Light Vision feature

Skill Feats: 1 selections
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +2 (dexterity; untrained) Intimidation: +5 (charisma; trained) Society: +3 (intelligence; untrained)
Arcana: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Medicine: +1 (wisdom; untrained) Stabling Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained)
Athletics: +10 (strength; master) Nature: +1 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +2 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Occultism: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Survival: +1 (wisdom; untrained)
Deception: +1 (charisma; untrained) Performance: +5 (charisma; trained) Thievery: +2 (dexterity; untrained)
Diplomacy: +1 (charisma; untrained) Religion: +5 (wisdom; trained)

Languages: Abyssal; Common; Gnomish; Halfling; Terran
Skill Notes:
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 6 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Cloud Jump: May long jump triple normal distance, high jump normal long jump distance, and add 25' to jump distance for every additional action spent
Combat Climber: Does not suffer flat-footed and may fight while Climbing/May Climb with one hand occupied
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Powerful Leap: May jump 5' vertically and +5' horizontally
Quick Climb: Climbing success increases distance by 5', critical success by 10'
Quick Jump: May use High Jump and Long Jump as 1 action without an initial Stride
Quick Swim: Swimming success increases distance by 5', critical success by 10'
Rapid Mantel: May stand immediately after a successful Grab an Edge/May use Athletics to Grab an Edge
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Titan Wrestler: May Disarm, Grapple, Shove, or Trip creatures up to 2 sizes larger
Wall Jump: May follow a jump with another 1-action jump when adjacent to a wall 1/turn
Combat
Hit Points: 28 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Fighter: 16 (strength; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Attack Of Opportunity: May use a Reaction to make a melee Strike on foe that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Dueling Parry: May gain +2 AC when wielding a one-handed weapon with the other hand free
Exacting Strike: May make a Strike that does not count toward multiple attack penalty on failure
Shield Block: May use a Reaction when shield is raised to negate damage up to its hardness and have it absorb half of remaining damage
Underwater Marauder: Does not suffer flat-footed from being in water/Suffers no penalty when using bludgeoning and slashing weapons in water
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +5 (wisdom; trained)
Notes
Validation Errors:
